safety.label: Quality Assurance
safety.title:
Uncompromising
Safety
safety.corrosion_desc: Forget about chimney replacement for decades. We use only premium acid-resistant steel that does not degrade in aggressive flue gas environments.
safety.fire_desc: Withstands extreme temperatures up to 1000째C. Your home and family remain safe even in case of boiler failure or soot ignition.
safety.warranty_desc: Full responsibility for every system element. Our products hold CE Certification and undergo rigorous quality controls.
